trans-unit.source: Scans JScript code searching for individual units of code, or *tokens*.
trans-unit.target: Skanner JScript-kode søker etter individuelle enheter med kode, eller *tokener*.

trans-unit.source: This class belongs to the scanning and parsing category.
trans-unit.target: Denne klassen hører til kategorien skanning og analyse av.

trans-unit.source: For more information about scanning and parsing, see [Create a Language Compiler for the .NET Framework](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=110392).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om skanning og analyse [opprette en språk-kompilator for .NET Framework](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=110392).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="Microsoft.JScript.JSScanner"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="Microsoft.JScript.JSScanner"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="Microsoft.JScript.JSScanner"></xref> class, specifying the source code to scan.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="Microsoft.JScript.JSScanner"> </xref> klasse, angir kildekode til å søke.

trans-unit.source: The source code to scan.
trans-unit.target: Kildekode til å søke.

trans-unit.source: Gets the current line number in the code.
trans-unit.target: Henter gjeldende linjenummer i koden.

trans-unit.source: This is a pointer that moves as the code is scanned.
trans-unit.target: Dette er en peker flytter som koden skannes.

trans-unit.source: The current line number in the code.
trans-unit.target: Gjeldende linjenummer i koden.

trans-unit.source: Gets the current position in the code string.
trans-unit.target: Henter gjeldende plassering i code-streng.

trans-unit.source: This is a pointer that moves as the code is scanned.
trans-unit.target: Dette er en peker flytter som koden skannes.

trans-unit.source: This parameter is ignored.
trans-unit.target: Denne parameteren ignoreres.

trans-unit.source: The current position in the code string.
trans-unit.target: Gjeldende plassering i code-streng.

trans-unit.source: Scans for the next token in the code.
trans-unit.target: Skanner for neste-token i koden.

trans-unit.source: Gets the source code that is associated with this scanner object.
trans-unit.target: Henter kildekode som er knyttet til dette skanner-objektet.

trans-unit.source: The source code is specified to the <xref:Microsoft.JScript.JSScanner.%23ctor%28Microsoft.JScript.Context%29> method or to the <xref:Microsoft.JScript.JSScanner.SetSource%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Kildekode er angitt til den <xref:Microsoft.JScript.JSScanner.%23ctor%28Microsoft.JScript.Context%29>metoden eller til den <xref:Microsoft.JScript.JSScanner.SetSource%2A>metoden.</xref:Microsoft.JScript.JSScanner.SetSource%2A> </xref:Microsoft.JScript.JSScanner.%23ctor%28Microsoft.JScript.Context%29>

trans-unit.source: The source code to scan.
trans-unit.target: Kildekode til å søke.

trans-unit.source: Gets the position in the code string where the first line of the current code starts.
trans-unit.target: Henter posisjonen i koden strengen der den første linjen i den gjeldende koden starter.

trans-unit.source: All lines of code are stored in a single string.
trans-unit.target: Alle linjer Code lagres i en enkelt streng.

trans-unit.source: This is a pointer that moves as the code is scanned.
trans-unit.target: Dette er en peker flytter som koden skannes.

trans-unit.source: The position in the code string where the first line of the current code starts.
trans-unit.target: Posisjonen i koden streng der den første linjen i den gjeldende koden som starter.

trans-unit.source: Gets a string that has been scanned and had all its escape sequences replaced.
trans-unit.target: Henter en streng som har skannet, og som har alle de avbruddssekvenser erstattes.

trans-unit.source: A string that has been scanned and had all its escape sequences replaced.
trans-unit.target: En streng som har skannet, og som har alle de avbruddssekvenser erstattes.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the end of a line was reached after the scanner scans or peeks for a token.
trans-unit.target: Angir om nådde slutten på en linje etter at skanneren skanner eller tar en titt for en token.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the end of the line was reached; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis ende av linjen ble nådd. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified token is a keyword in the JScript language.
trans-unit.target: Bestemmer om det angitte tokenet er et nøkkelord i JScript-språket.

trans-unit.source: The token to check.
trans-unit.target: Tokenet, for å se.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the token is a keyword; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis tokenet er et nøkkelord; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified token is an operator in the JScript language.
trans-unit.target: Bestemmer om det angitte tokenet er en operator i JScript-språket.

trans-unit.source: The token to check.
trans-unit.target: Tokenet, for å se.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the token is an operator; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis tokenet er en operator; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Sets a flag that indicates whether the scanner is operating in authoring mode.
trans-unit.target: Angir et flagg som indikerer om skanneren fungerer i modus for redigering.

trans-unit.source: An example of operating in authoring mode occurs when a host scans the code in an editor to colorize it.
trans-unit.target: Et eksempel på opererer i redigeringsmodus oppstår når en verten søker koden i et redigeringsprogram til fargelegge den.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate authoring mode; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>for å angi redigeringsmodus; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Sets the source code to scan.
trans-unit.target: Angir kildekode til å søke.

trans-unit.source: The source code to scan.
trans-unit.target: Kildekode til å søke.

trans-unit.source: Skips a comment that spans multiple lines, and advances the pointers that identify the current position in the code.
trans-unit.target: Hopper over en merknad som går over flere linjer, og flytter pekere som identifiserer gjeldende plassering i koden.

trans-unit.source: The new current position in the code string.
trans-unit.target: Ny gjeldende plassering i code-streng.
